about_the_game:
A dark shadow rises along the horizon. The Kingdom of Auranöva is in danger: The first born of King Renald has vanished and now it's up to his brother to find the missing heir to the throne. Will he find his brother and discover the reason for his disappearance? How will he come along with a thief drinking preferably alone, a wizard searching for a lost artifact, a young dwarf who wants to become a cleric in the church of technology and other strangers?

Welcome to the world of Fallen Symphony: Grab your sword, charge your mana and prepare yourself and your companions for battle. While the paths of your adventurers cross, a long forgotten evil is on the rise. An ancient prophecy is spoken again. The whispers in the streets grow louder every day and something in the distant corners of the world seems to be off...

The world of Fallen Symphony is full of heated battles, engaging puzzles, and fearsome dungeons. Prepare yourself for a unique battle system which is inspired by brawlers from late 90s and gameplay based on the JRPGs of old.

Features:

  • A unique mix of 3D & 2D visuals in 16-bit
  • A combat system heavily inspired by Brawlers of the good ol' days
  • Form your party of adventurers
  • Encounter massive bosses and figure out their weak points
  • An evolving story true to the old JRPG formula
